src:
Sist døde gresset: Nå venter den kaldeste Lerkendal-kvelden på ni år
07 Nov 2019, 12:35 by Petter Rasmus,Ole K. Sagbakken
RBKs banemester Anders Øien minnes den bitende kulden i 2010. Foran kveldens kulde-kamp mot Sporting Lisboa er pulsen en helt annen.
Dersom værprognosene slår til, vil kveldens oppgjør mot Sporting CP på Lerkendal gå inn i historien som den tredje kaldeste matchen i klubbens Europa-historie.
text:
Last time the grass died: Now the coldest Lerkendal night is waiting for nine years
07 Nov 2019, 12:35 by Petter Rasmus, Ole K. Sagbakken
RBK's champion Anders Øien remembers the biting cold in 2010. Before tonight's cold match against Sporting Lisbon, the pulse is a completely different one.
If the weather forecasts turn up, tonight's settlement against Sporting CP at Lerkendal will go down in history as the third coldest match in the club's European history.
